item.title: Optimal Clustering with Bandit Feedback
item.description: Logistics Time: 2:00-3:00 PM; 5/24/2022 Zoom Lecture Presenter Vincent Y. F. Tan Associate Professor and Dean's Chair Deparrtment of Electrical and Computer Engineering Department of Mathematics National University of Singapore Abstract This paper considers the problem of online clustering with bandit feedback. A set of arms (or items) can be partitioned into various groups that are unknown. Within each group, the observations associated to each of the arms follow the same distribution with the same mean vector.
